text.text_translated: NASA is now working to identify and record some of the smaller asteroids. These are large rocks that travel in space and are 140 metres or more across. Scientists think there are about 25,000 asteroids of this size, but only about 8,000 have been identified and recorded so far. This means 17,000 have not been identified yet. In 2013, a 19-metre asteroid exploded above Chelyabinsk in Russia. It hurt 1,200 people. Because of this, these medium-sized asteroids would be a big danger if they come into Earth's orbit.

best_attempt.text_translated: NASA is now working to identify and record some of the smaller asteroids, which are large rocks that travel in space and are 140 metres or more wide. Scientists estimate there are about 25,000 asteroids of this size, but only about 8,000 have been identified and recorded so far, leaving 17,000 unaccounted for. In 2013, a 19-metre asteroid exploded above Chelyabinsk in Russia. It injured 1,200 people. Because of this, these middle-sized asteroids would be a serious danger if they enter Earth's orbit.
